revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR4300 |revision=v1 |series=N750 |upc=606449084528 |asin=B008HO9DK4 |est_release_date=07/06/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY312100187 |fcc_date=06/21/2012 |ic_id=4054A-12100187 |pcb_id=2976394803 |flags=DFS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F1G08ABADA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:8E:F2,20:E5:A2 |oui_eth=00:8E:F2,20:E5:A2 }} {{TagLine|N750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}}
:"2976394803" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This is the same Delta Networks board P/N as the [[Netgear WNDR3700v4]]. :{{WiFiCert|WFA17611|02/01/2013}} The default SSID patterns used are '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G'''.
*Netgear WNDR4300-100NAS (North American Solutions) :US region (United States of America) *Netgear WNDR4300-100PES (Pan European Solutions) :CE region (Central and Eastern Europe)
Premium Edition features: :ReadySHARE Cloud (free until 09/01/2014), :Apple Time Machine compatible, :Expand TiVo Storage to shared USB drive, :ReadySHARE USB, ReadySHARE Printer, :Video Mode for 5GHz
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr4300 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] :[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 00:8E:F2 OUI] *[https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Netgear_WNDR4300 '''DD-WRT Wiki''']
===Reviews=== *[http://uk.hardware.info/reviews/3685/4/netgear-wndr4300-review-3800+40004300-photos-and-screenshots Photos on '''nl.hardware.info'''] :"2976394805" is silkscreened on the board. :20:E5:A2 OUI, '''NETGEARXX''' SSID on the label
